attributes.action: Provide funding for CAHMS services to support young people.
attributes.additional_details: Teenagers during and before the Coronavirus pandemic have suffered through some difficult times which could be quite damaging to their mental state. CAHMS currently accounts for 0.7% of the NHS funding. The support for diagnosis is devastating, people are waiting years to get the diagnosis that they need. Appointments being cancelled... National Lockdowns... This has all lead to a downfall in teenager mental health. CAHMS is worth 6.4% out of 11% in the mental health spending. This still isn't ok!
attributes.background: With COVID-19 pandemic, Teenagers and youngsters have left with either fake news or mixed opinions about what is happening. This leads to the mental drain and lack of concentration when it comes to their online education. Education should also be doing their best to ensure students are well.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increased funding/support to Children and Young People's mental health services.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558759

Require all schools to offer regular counselling to students
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328361
